details.title: Get File Coverage (coveralls)
details.description: Gets the coverage report of a given file.

inputendpoint.name: revision-list
inputendpoint.label: Revision List
inputendpoint.description: List of revision numbers to use for checking file coverage

inputendpoint.name: affected-file-matrix
inputendpoint.label: Affected File Matrix
inputendpoint.description: Matrix of affected files to use for retrieving the coverage

outputendpoint.name: coverage-report-matrix
outputendpoint.label: Coverage Report Matrix
outputendpoint.description: Info about the coverage of the different affected files
